replies.body: Does Staples have the same bag regulations as the NFL? (Clear bags only, only so big, ect.)

The STAPLES Center policy is "All bags larger than 14" x 14" (i.e. backpacks, suitcases, beach bags, etc.) will be prohibited from entry into the arena" Please note all bags will also be subject to inspection to enter the arena.
I have my ticket this year for finals (yay!) but will my Finals ticket get me entry to the League Festival at Worlds?

The League Festival at Worlds tonight (Friday, October 28) requires a separate ticket. Your Finals ticket will get you entry into the Pre-Finals Festival tomorrow (Saturday, October 29) from 10:00AM-2:00PM so you can check out the Riftwalk, League statues, and more before heading into STAPLES Center.
"Tossing out Swag" What does that mean?  Or is it what it says like a "meme" thing like "having fun" if not I'm confused.
"Swag" in this instance is like memorabilia, t-shirts, things like that, and they're going to just like randomly throw it into the crowds
Ah, I went to a concert once where the band would throw out memorabilia out to the crowd, one dude threw a whole drum set  out in the crowd; pretty sure it knocked someone out cold.
At Semi's they were little poro's and bracelets etc. Also look for people handing out lanyards and such. Semi's was amazing, Wish Finals was at MSG too :(

Can confirm, was at Day 1 of Quarters in Chicago. Little poros and saplings. However, they only threw it out once - not "throughout the event". Maybe it was also to punish us for booing. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
They're gonna throw "Worlds 2016" Exclusive branded stuff or League stuff at the Crowd like during some Pep Rally's
I purchased digital tickets, will those be accepted at the gates or do I need to print them out?
I bought digital tickets for nalcs finals, digital ones, but print them off anyways, just in case
I will be flying in from Omaha, NE solo, if anyone wants to meet up for the festival or finals let me know. Can't wait to go and I'm glad that they are bringing Zedd in!
Will the riftwalk be accessible after the tournament?
Will we have a goodie bag? Just asking {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Is there going to be in game rewards for ticket holders like skin sets or RP just wondering?
man I wish there was tickets weren't so expensive from all the scalpers 3 months ago
